Detailed Description

Guid used to define the Firmware File System 2.

Revision Reference:
GUIDs introduced in PI Version 1.0.

Define Documentation

#define EFI_FFS_VOLUME_TOP_FILE_GUID   { 0x1BA0062E, 0xC779, 0x4582, { 0x85, 0x66, 0x33, 0x6A, 0xE8, 0xF7, 0x8F, 0x9 } }

A Volume Top File (VTF) is a file that must be located such that the last byte of the file is also the last byte of the firmware volume

#define EFI_FIRMWARE_FILE_SYSTEM2_GUID   { 0x8c8ce578, 0x8a3d, 0x4f1c, { 0x99, 0x35, 0x89, 0x61, 0x85, 0xc3, 0x2d, 0xd3 } }

The firmware volume header contains a data field for the file system GUID
